content: launching september 9th 2024 introducing the gift of christmas crochet along recreate the joy of christmas morning with this fun cal in six weekly parts designed with beginners in mind but with plenty to excite more experienced crocheters this project will help you build your crochet skills as the weeks progress the whole blanket is crocheted with not a single stitch to be sewn every week has an accompanying video to guide you stitch by stitch each block is a little bitesize project in itself and moreish like dipping into the tin of christmas chocolates to make sure that you don t miss a thing subscribe to receive the black sheep wools newsletter and you ll be the first to know #giftofchristmascal @madebyanita instagram https //www instagram com/madebyanita/ hl=en
